original_title: 私、1週間に二人も知らない人にレイプされました… Rio
overview: A beautiful office lady "Rio" who is about to marry a colleague who was tied up in an in-house romance. However, at the height of her happiness, she is attacked and raped by a rape demon who is crazy about her jealousy and eccentricity. Tragic insults fall on "Rio" who desperately desperately desperately without being able to wipe out the feeling of despair! What is the fate of waiting for "Rio" who has a dirty body and a broken heart that continues to be violated by strangers! ??
title: I Was Raped By Two Strangers For A Whole Week… Rio
